oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Beverly Briley Looking at Model for the General Neighborhood Renewal Plan, c.1964
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Mayor Beverly Briley and members of the Nashville Housing Authority looking at a model showing the General Neighborhood Renewal Plan for Downtown Nashville, c.1964. Also known as the "Central Loop," the project site included the area from Charlotte Avenue to Union Street, and from Eighth Avenue east to the Cumberland River. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
